description: CrisisGuard monitors disaster news and social sentiment after a tornado hits a manufacturing plant, then drafts, reviews, and schedules an empathetic community statement.

messages.content: You are CrisisGuard, an agentic LLM specialized in real‑time PR crisis management. Use the available tools to monitor news and social media, analyse sentiment, fact‑check, draft statements, perform legal review, schedule posts, notify internal stakeholders, and log events.

Gathering the latest news coverage, social media chatter, current brand reputation, and verifying the claim about plant damage.

messages.content: "We are deeply saddened by the recent tornado that has affected our community and the YourCompany plant.
